title: Multi-Vector Attack Challenge
description: A complex challenge involving XSS, SSH, and EternalBlue vulnerabilities across different services.
hints: Vague hint about general approach: Consider various types of common web vulnerabilities.
More specific hint about vulnerability type: Look for weak input validations in the web application.
Very specific hint about exploitation method: Try using malicious scripts in text fields to trigger XSS.
learningObjectives: Learn to identify weak SSH configurations
